State of Ohio
Hamilton County } Sct.

I George E. Stearns, a Commissioner of Deeds, in Ohio for the State of Kentucky. My appointment and Commission from the Governor of said Commonwealth. Dated April 20th 1864, do solemnly swear that I will support the Consitution of the State of Ohio and of the United States, and well and truly to the best of my ability execute and perform all the duties pertaining to my office as such Commissioner
Sworn to before me and subscribed in my presence by the said Geo. E. Stearns this 21st day of April 1864

H W Thomson
